pages.text: 23|43|(avarkalil enakku maruceyta) ovvoru vakupparum (avarkal alintupoka nam erpatuttiya) avarkalatu tavanaiyai muntavumillai; pintavumillai. (Cariyaka attavanaiyil alintu vittanar)

23|44|pinnarum nam tutarkalai oruvar pin oruvaraka nam anuppik konte iruntom. Oru vakupparitam avarkalutaiya tutar vantapotellam avarkal avaraip poyyakkik konte iruntarkal. Akave, namum (avvakuppinarkalai) oruvarukkup pin oruvaraka alittuk konte vantu avarkal anaivaraiyum (pinnullavarkal pecakkutiya) verum carittiramakki vittom. Akave, nampikkai kollata (ittakaiya) makkalukkuk ketutan
23|45|Pinnar, musavaiyum avarutaiya cakotarar harunaiyum nam vacanankalaik kontum, telivana atarankalaik kontum nam anuppinom
23|46|hpir'avnitamum avanutaiya piratanikalitamum (anuppivaittom). Avarkalo karvam kontu perumai atikkum makkalaka iruntarkal
23|47|nam'maip ponra manitarkalana (inta) iruvarai nam nampikkai kolvoma? (Atuvum) avarkalatu camukattinaro, namakku atimaikalaka irukkinranar
23|48|akave, ivviruvaraiyum poyyarena avarkal kurinarkal. Itan karanamaka avarkal alikkappattup poyinar
23|49|avarkal nerana valiyil celvatarkaka musavukku nam oru vetattaik kotuttom. (Eninum, atai avarkal porutpatuttavillai)
23|50|maryamutaiya makanaiyum avarutaiya tayaiyum nam or attatci akki avviruvaraiyum mikka celippum, nir valamum poruntiya, vacippatarku mikavum takutiyana uyariya pumiyil vacikkumpatic ceytom
23|51|(nam anuppiya ovvoru tutaraiyum nokki) â€œen tutarkale! Ninkal paricuttamanavarraiye puciyunkal. Narkariyankalaiye ceyyunkal. Niccayamaka nan ninkal ceypavarrai nankariven

23|52|niccayamaka unkal inta markkam ore oru valitan. (Itil verrumai kitaiyatu.) Nantan unkal iraivan. Akave, ninkal ennaiye ancunkal'' (enru kattalai ittiruntom. Avarkalum tam makkalukku ivvare kuri vantanar)
23|53|eninum, (yutarkalum, kirittavarkalum) tankal vetattai(p puratti) palavarakap pirittukkontu (avarkalil) ovvoru vakupparum tankalitam ullavarraik kontu cantosam ataikinranar
23|54|akave, (napiye!) Nir avarkalai oru kalam varai avarkalutaiya mayakkattil alntu kitakka vittu vituviraka
23|55|Nam avarkalukku an cantatikalaiyum porulkalaiyum kotuttu varuvataip parri avarkal enna ninaittuk kontanar
23|56|itanal niccayamaka nam avarkalukku nanmai ceyvatil tiviramaka irukkirom enru ninaikkinranara? Avvaralla! (Atu etarkaka enpatai) avarkal unarntu kollavillai
23|57|niccayamaka evarkal tankal iraivanukkup payantu natunkik kontirukkirarkalo avarkalum
23|58|evarkal tankal iraivanin vacanankalai meyyakave nampikkaikolkirarkalo avarkalum
23|59|evarkal tankal iraivanukku evaraiyum inai akkamal irukkinranaro avarkalum
